Text Description: This dish is a traditional dish made by boiling kidney beans and then steaming them. The beans are crushed into a paste, shaped into rectangles, layered with bean paste, and rolled up; the rolls are then sliced into smaller pieces for serving.

Name: Ulava charu
Text Description: This dish is a soup like dish made with horse gram. The horse gram is boiled in water with salt, then strained from the soup before serving.

Name: Purtumute
Text Description: The dish is prepared by stewing several types of beans and corn, seasoned made with coriander.

Name: Chouriço doce
Text Description: This dish is a blood sausage prepared with pig blood, brown sugar or honey, cashew nuts and spices.

Name: Kulen
Text Description: The sausage is made of minced pork.

Name: Head cheese
Text Description: This dish is a cold cut terrine or meat jelly. It is made with flesh from the head of a calf or pig (less commonly a sheep or cow), typically set in aspic, and usually eaten cold, at room temperature, or in a sandwich.

Name: Calabacitas con puerco
Text Description: This dish consists of pork that is sauteed in butter, oil or in its own fat. Garlic, onion, black pepper, salt and chilis are added, and left on the fire until everything is cooked. Chopped red tomato, corn grains, bay leaf, cumin and black pepper are then added. All this is boiled until the meat is tender. Chopped pumpkin or zucchini is added until finally cooked. This dish is usually served with refried beans and red rice.

Name: Chilorio
Text Description: This dish is generally made from pork fried in chili sauce.

Name: Frijoles Puercos
Text Description: This dish is characterized by blended beans stewed with lard, chile pepper, chorizo, Chihuahua cheese.

Name: Rauchkäse
Text Description: This is a type of smoked cheese, known for being semi-soft with a smoky brown rind. It is typically smoked using birch or spruce woods.

Name: Balyk
Text Description: The dish is the salted and dried soft parts of fish, usually coming from large valuable species. Over time, the term was applied to smoked fish of this kind.

Name: Bijajica
Text Description: The dish is made by cassava starch, eggs, and sugar, fried in lard.

Name: Manjar branco
Text Description: The dish is pudding mold with coconut extract.

Name: Sač
Text Description: The dish refer to a dish made of meat, vegetable and potatoes, baked in it.

Name: Fusi
Text Description: The dish is a diagonally striped shaped pasta, usually served with veal, onions, tomato paste, and white wine.

Name: Bacalhau com natas
Text Description: The dish is made of salted cod baked with onions, diced potatoes, and double cream.

Name: Bacalhau com todos
Text Description: The dish is made of boiled codfish, vegetable such as potato, carrots and cabbage, and hard-boiled eggs.

Name: Paio
Text Description: The dish is a smoked sausage with pork loin meat, seasoned with garlic, salt, and pepper.

Name: Chanfana
Text Description: The dish is a old goat meat roasted in wood-fired ovens.

Name: Lauzinaj
Text Description: This dish is an almond-based confection by blending crushed sugar and almonds with rosewater, and rolling it in thin dough. The finished pastry would be drenched in rosewater-flavored simple syrup and garnished with crushed pistachio.

Name: Catatos
Text Description: The dish is made with fried caterpillars and garlic. It is often served over rice.

Name: Maboké
Text Description: It is a fish dish, with roasted spices, wrapped in banana leaf.

Name: Sangah
Text Description: The dish is a food made with maize, cassava leaf, and palm nut juice. The leaves are mashed and the cooked mixture becomes a thick stew. It is often accompanied by rice or boiled plantain.

Name: Sabaayad
Text Description: The dish is a type of flatbread. It is usually eaten during breakfast or dinner. It is made from a dough of plain flour, water and salt.

Name: Rolex
Text Description: The food is prepared by combining an egg omelette and vegetables wrapped in a flatbread. This single-portion dish is quick to prepare and can be eaten at any time of the day, from breakfast to lunch or supper or a snack.
